name: Virtual Christmas Cottage 199X
description:
Experience Christmas in a cozy cottage like it's 199X. The fire is crackling in the background while warm cookies are waiting for you to be enjoyed. Cuttle with your cat on your comfy couch or open up your Christmas present and have fun with that. It's all up to you in this relaxed and soothing experience.

 

 

 

This is a solo developer project. This game was made as a present to a special giftee from the Secret Santa Jam 2020 . All assets where either created during the jam or are CC0-Licensed, gathered from various sources with the following exceptions:

  • "Christmas Eve" Composed by Michael Spect (www.soundspect.com)
  • "Sleeping Cat" Model made by Pasu (https://sketchfab.com/psucdeviantart)
